product.cushioning: Massive CloudTec pods with Helion superfoam for a soft, yet powerful and bouncy ride.
product.breathability: Breathable, engineered mesh upper designed to keep feet cool.
product.short_description: Unleash monstrous energy with the On Mens Cloudmonster 2, the most cushioned and powerful shoe in the On lineup. Designed for runners who crave a soft, yet incredibly responsive ride, the Cloudmonster 2 lives up to its name by delivering a truly unique and exhilarating running experience. Its most distinctive feature is the massive CloudTec? pods, the largest ever created by On, which are engineered to provide maximum impact absorption and a plush, cloud-like landing. These pods are combined with a full-length Speedboard? that has been redesigned for even more energy return, effectively capturing the cushioning and transforming it into powerful forward propulsion. The result is a ride that feels both incredibly soft and bouncy, propelling you forward with every stride. The upper is crafted from a highly breathable, engineered mesh that provides a comfortable and secure fit, while reflective details enhance visibility. Whether you're tackling a long marathon training run or simply want to experience the ultimate in cushioned comfort, the On Mens Cloudmonster 2 offers a monster dose of energy and a ride unlike any other.
product.about_this_item: Nylon-blend Speedboard for momentum & powerful take-offs, Biggest-ever CloudTec for an extra cushioned running shoe, Max cushioning, max energy return, Reworked dual-density Helion superfoam adds bounce, Foam insert in the forefoot to absorb impact
